alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 1:07PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORM NEAR GALENA LODGE MOVING SLOWLY NORTHEAST THROUGH RURAL BLAINE AND CUSTER COUNTIES THROUGH 200 PM MDT... At 103 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Galena Lodge, moving slowly northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph, pea sized hail, brief heavy rain, and occasional lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Galena Lodge and Livingston Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
